title: Understndg Mkts Data Sci
description: This course applies a data science approach using network and text analytics to model and analyze how individuals and various kinds of markets behave.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PUBP 3120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
